external_games.name: The Legend of Damon and the Ongoing Infection

name: The Legend of Damon and the Ongoing Infection
storyline:
Its a creature called the Infection that has infected your land. You Damon is one of the only people to be immune to this infection but that does not mean you are safe the infected will hunt you down. Some Humans can just be a little infected that causes them to switch between normal and infected. You Damon is on a quest to find and kill the Guardian Creatures and when they are dead you will be able to see the Infection and you will be able to kill it.
To Save the World
summary: A Evil creature has infected you land. You play as a character named Damon he is on a quest to make everything normal again. He needs to fight infected creatures monsters and humans. You can find weapons in the wild and learn skills from small dungeon like buildings made by humans 100 000 years ago. Save Villages and people. Do side-quests and earn rewards. Cross the sea and find islands and Find secrets.
